statements.select:
SELECT a.ColumnId,a.Code, a.COL_Name,a.ParentId,a.COL_Path FROM Pub_ArticleColumn a WHERE a.Status=1
ShowMode=#ShowMode# AreaId=#AreaId#
order by a.OrderNo

select top (#ROWNUM#) a.ArticleId,a.Title,a.PublishDate,a.SubTitle from Pub_Article a inner join Pub_ArticleColumn_Relation b on a.ArticleId= b.ArticleId inner join Pub_ArticleColumn c on b.ColumnId=c.ColumnId and c.Status=1 and a.Status=1 and HomeShowFlag=1 and ISNULL(ExpiredDate,GETDATE())>= GETDATE()
a.AreaId=#AreaId# b.ColumnId=#ColumnId#
order by a.PublishDate desc

select top (#ROWNUM#) SourceId,AttachmentTag,SaveName,SaveThumbName from Pub_Attachment WHERE Status=1
SourceId=#SourceId# AttachmentTag=#AttachmentTag# SourceTable=#SourceTable#
order by CheckInTime desc

select 1 as NoUse from Pub_Article a inner join Pub_ArticleColumn_Relation b on a.ArticleId= b.ArticleId inner join Pub_ArticleColumn c on b.ColumnId=c.ColumnId and c.Status=1 and a.Status=1 and ISNULL(ExpiredDate,GETDATE())>= GETDATE()
a.AreaId=#AreaId# b.ColumnId=#ColumnId# $WhereClause$

with CTE_StreetAndCommunitiy as ( select cast(a.AreaId as varchar(40)) as ItemId,a.AreaCode as ItemCode,a.AreaName as ItemName,a.ParentId,a.Levels,a.OrderNo from Pub_Area a where a.Status=1 and a.ParentId = #ParentId# union all select cast(a.AreaId as varchar(40)) as ItemId,a.AreaCode as ItemCode,a.AreaName as ItemName,a.ParentId,a.Levels,a.OrderNo from Pub_Area a inner join CTE_StreetAndCommunitiy b on a.ParentId = b.ItemId where a.Status=1 ) select m.* from CTE_StreetAndCommunitiy m order by OrderNo

select 1 as NoUse from Pub_Article where Status=1 and VideoFlag=1
and ArticleId in( select ArticleId from Pub_ArticleColumn_Relation where Status=1 and ColumnId in(select ColumnId from Pub_ArticleColumn where Status=1
AreaId=#AreaId#
) )
$WhereClause$
